com.here.android.mpa.customlocation2

Class CLE2Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.customlocation2.CLE2Request
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CLE2AttributeRequest, CLE2BoundingBoxRequest, CLE2CorridorRequest, CLE2ProximityRequest, CLE2QuadkeyRequest

    public class CLE2Request
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a custom location search request.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CLE2Request.CLE2Error
      Represents values describing possible search request errors.
      static class  CLE2Request.CLE2GeometryType
      Specifies the geometry representation in the result.
      static interface  CLE2Request.CLE2ResultListener
      Represents a listener that reports information about the completion of a custom location search CLE2Request.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public java.lang.String execute(CLE2Request.CLE2ResultListener listener)
        Executes the asynchronous custom location request.
        Parameters:
        listener - A CLE2Request.CLE2ResultListener to be notified when the search request is completed.
        Returns:
        CLE2Request.CLE2Error.NONE if request is sent successfully, otherwise, error message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if listener is {code null}.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancels a search request in progress. Otherwise, nothing happens.

      • setQuery

        public CLE2Request setQuery(java.lang.String query)
        Specifies the filter(s) to be used for a custom location request. When specified, only geometries where expression evaluates to true will be returned. An example query can be like this "RATING > 3 &amp;&amp; NAME != 'MyPlace23'" where RATING and NAME are column names.
        Parameters:
        query - A JavaScript expression as a string being evaluated for each geometry.
        Returns:
        current instance for chaining operation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if query is empty.

      • setGeometry

        public CLE2Request setGeometry(CLE2Request.CLE2GeometryType geometry)
        Sets the geometry representation in request. Default value for all request is CLE2Request.CLE2GeometryType.LOCAL, except for CLE2AttributeRequest . CLE2AttributeRequest only supports CLE2Request.CLE2GeometryType.FULL.
        Returns:
        current instance for chaining operation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if request is CLE2AttributeRequest and CLE2Request.CLE2GeometryType is not CLE2Request.CLE2GeometryType.FULL.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object other)
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object

        public int hashCode()
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
